import { useState } from 'react' import logo from '../../assets/logos/wc-logo.png' import RoadToOne from '../../assets/logos/one-show-road-to-one-v2.PNG' import EventDetailPage from './EventDetailPage' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' export default function EventCard({ event }) { // const [showAtheleteModal, setShowAtheleteModal] = useState(false) return (
{handleClick(event)}} key={event.id} className="group relative"> {console.log(event.id)} {/* */}

#{event.event_number} {event.name}

{event.date} @ {event.location}

{/* */}
)}
